title: I saw a mind coach to stop my excess sweating
text:
I always thought mind coaches were just for pampered sports stars, but then I went to see one and he changed my life in less than an hour.

Vinny Shoreman has worked with high-profile UFC fighters like Eddie Alverez and Cody Garbrandt, and has taught self-hypnosis techniques to millions of people live on air via the broadcasting behemoth that is the Joe Rogan Experience podcast.

Shoreman uses a range of techniques including neuro-linguistic programming (NLP) and hypnosis. As well getting fighters to perform to the best of their ability, he takes a lot of satisfaction with dealing with more everyday problems such as addictions and phobias.

So how could he help me? Ever since I was a teenager...
